title: I was perma banned without getting the 3 warnings. (I only got 1)
body: Today I was permabanned because I was a beyond-toxic player. I got that and I understand that I should be punished for it. I just don't remember getting the 2nd chat ban and the 2 week ban. I might be wrong and I apologize if I am, but if I'm losing my account forever, I might aswell try and check if something went wrong. Thank you in advance.

replies.body: You know nothing went wrong. That's why you didn't post your chat logs. You know what you did.

If you are "beyond toxic" as you state, it's possible to skip the two chat restrictions. Nothing went wrong. Players who fully realize they are "beyond toxic" and yet don't care shouldn't be playing, which is why Riot permabans them.

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gdATGbAc,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-04-14T06:02:59.581+0000)
>
> stop spamming this drivel

oops sorry man I didn't think you would be on tonight
